frost.description:
[Basic Attack]:Deals [Damage Rate: 90%] Magic Damage.

Can cast [Ice Burst] every 5s.
Deals [Damage Rate: 150%] Magic Damage to the target
and Immobilizes them for 1.5s

Replaces Basic Attack with [Frostbite Zone]
Creates a zone of deep frost in the target direction,
dealing [Damage Rate: 130%] Magic Damage to enemies
in range and reducing their Movement Speed by 25% for
4s

Replaces Basic Attack with [Frost Burst].
Launches three frost shards in the target direction after a
delay, each dealing [Damage Rate: 110%] Magic Damage
to enemies hit. The damage from shards beyond the first
is reduced by 25%.

After not taking damage for 15s, gains [Target-based Max
HP 20%] Shield. When hit by Basic Attacks, applies [Frost]
to the attacker.
[Frost]: Reduces Attack Speed and Movement Speed by
40% for 4s, gradually weakening over time.

Channels for 3s, continuously firing a frost beam in the
target direction that deals [Damage Rate: 60%] Magic
Damage to players ([Damage Rate: 120%] Magic Damage
to mobs) every 0.5s to those hit and inflicts [Frost Beam
Slow] for 3s, stacking up to 5 times.

[Frost Beam Slow]
Movement Speed Bonus: -8% (-8% per stack, can stack)

Launches crystalline frost in the target direction. Upon
hitting the first enemy, it explodes to deal [Damage Rate:
250%] Magic Damage and Immobilize enemies in range
for 2s.

frost.skillName:
Deals [Damage Rate: 200%] Magic Damage to nearby
enemies and Freezes them for 0.5s, then blinks in the
target direction.
frost.description:
Deals [Damage Rate: 200%] Magic Damage to nearby
enemies and Freezes them for 0.5s, then blinks in the
target direction.

Creates a frost wall before the caster that lasts 8s.
Enemies inside are Slowed by 70%, take [Damage Rate:
50%] Magic Damage every second, and gain [Chill] stacks.
Stacks up to 2 times.
[Chill]: At max stacks, targets are Frozen for 1.5s and
become immune to [Chill] for 6s.

Unleashes a freezing roar in the target direction, dealing
Damage Rate: 200%] Magic Damage and knocking
enemies back 10m. Reduces Movement Speed by 30% and
Attack Speed by 30% for 4s.

Channels for 3s, releasing frost winds in the target
direction that deal [Damage Rate: 100%] Magic Damage
to players ([Damage Rate: 200%] Magic Damage to mobs)
every 0.5s and reduce Movement Speed by 30% for 3s.
Can move slowly while channeling

Creates a freezing cyclone at the target location, lasting
5s. Enemies inside are Slowed by 60% and take 
[Damage Rate: 90%] Magic Damage every second.

frost.changes:
- Damage Rate 60% -> 70%
- Maximum Number of Hits on Same Target 2 -> 3
frost.description:
Launches ice in the target direction. Upon hitting an
enemy, it splits into 3 ice shards that bounce between
nearby enemies up to 5 times. Each target can be hit up to
3 times.
Each hit deals [Damage Rate: 70%] Magic Damage and
reduces Attack Speed by 15% for 4s. Stacks up to 3 times.

Places a Frost Nova at the target location, lasting 15s.
When triggered by an enemy, deals [Damage Rate: 250%]
Magic Damage and reduces Movement Speed by 35% and
15% reduced healing for 6s.
Gains 1 charge every 15s, up to 3 charges

Launches a frost orb in the target direction that deals
[Damage Rate: 70%] Magic Damage every second and
reduces Movement Speed by 40% for 3s to enemies in
range. Within 3s, can recast to blink to the orb's location,
dealing [Damage Rate: 250%] Magic Damage and
Freezing nearby enemies for 1.5s.

frost.changes:
- First Segment Damage Rate 150% -> 75%
- Second Segment Damage Rate 350% -> 400%
- Cooldown 18s -> 22s
frost.description:
Creates a frost crystal at the target location that forms
after 0.7s, dealing [Damage Rate: 75%] Magic Damage
and Freezing enemies for 1.5s.
After 1s, the crystal shatters, dealing [Damage Rate:
400%] Magic Damage, and reducing Movement Speed by
40% and Attack Speed by 40% for 6s

Grants the power of arctic frost for 20s. Becomes immune
to Slows and Immobilize effects, and gains access to the
[Frost Slash] and [Frost Drift] skills.
-[Frost Slash]-
Launches ice blades forward that deal [Damage Rate:
110%] Magic Damage to enemies in their path, inflicting 1
stack of [Hypothermia] and reducing Movement Speed by
30% for 4s.
At 6 stacks of [Hypothermia], the target gains [Deep
Frost].
[Deep Frost]: Cannot attack or move for 1.5s.
-[Frost Drift] --
Instantly removes control effects and leaps in the target
direction.
[Deep Frost]: Cannot attack or move for 1.5s.
